longtext: The whole trick here, and what you really need to keep in mind is that we do not want to scramble these eggs.
And gentle with the pasta. You don't want to break it.
And if it looks too thick to you, also what you can do is just add a little bit of that pasta water.
Because if it doesn't thicken up like you like, literally what you can do is set that pan back on top of that pasta water and like a double boil or bainmarie, it will keep cooking the egg mixture.
